overview: It’s the best Bachelor Party you could ever hope for! Hosted at the DreamBoy Hotel, both boys are unwittingly booked into the same place... or are they? If you have friends as horny as these, you have got to know what to expect, and this movie definitely delivers all that and more. With the unique story-led themes and stars such as JP Dubois, Billy Rubens, Darius Ferdynand and Leo Domenico, as well as many more; it’s a fun time right up to the party, then it turns into something quite amazing. Seven twinks all enjoying themselves a little more than they perhaps should. If this is the Bachelor Party, imagine what the honeymoon is going to be like.
title: DreamBoy Hotel: Bachelor Party
